In a similar protocol.,
[6c]
in silico prediction of the toxicity was carried out on the freely accessible online pkCSM web server (Cambridge University) for all the EANPDB molecules.
[23] The pkCSM platform provides a prediction of several parameters related to absorptions, distribution, metabolism, excretion and toxicity (ADMET), which includes ten toxicity endpoints as seen in Tableâ€… 1.
